source: Registry of Open Data on AWS
description: AWS registry enables discovery and sharing of datasets that are available via AWS resources.
List of high quality, topic-centric public data sources.
DBpedia allows one to make sophisticated queries against Wikipedia, and link to other data sets on the Web to Wikipedia data.
Dataset Search enables users to find datasets stored across the Web through a simple keyword search.
Graph(s) showing how phrases have occurred in a corpus of books over selected years.
Google public data source repository; provides interactive visualization interface for exploring datasets.
Variety of dataset publication formats, emphasizing accessible, non-proprietary formats if possible, open, accessible data, easier to work with for more people regardless of their tools.
Comprehensive list of open data portals from around the world.
Google map presenting links to global open data resources for cities, regions, countries, and continents.
Links to non-BLS Internet sites are provided for convenience.
